mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_tb(category_id , product_name, price, product_feature, quantity, created_at) values(#{categoryId},#{productName},#{price},#{productFeature},#{quantity},now());
mapper.select:
select pt.id productId, pt.second_category_id secondCategoryId, pt.product_name productName, pt.price, pt.created_at createdAt, pit.image, sct.second_category_name secondCategoryName from product_tb pt join product_image_tb pit on pt.id = pit.product_id join second_category_tb sct on pt.second_category_id = sct.id where second_category_id = #{secondCategoryId} and pit.is_thumbnail = 1
order by(pt.price) DESC
order by(pt.price) ASC
order by(pt.created_at) DESC
limit 20;
